original_text: But thou shouldest not have looked on the day of thy brother in the day that he became a stranger; neither shouldest thou have rejoiced over the children of Judah in the day of their destruction; neither shouldest thou have spoken proudly in the day of distress.
korean_text: 네가 형제의 날 곧 그 재앙의 날에 방관할 것이 아니며 유다 자손이 패망하는 날에 기뻐할 것이 아니며 그 고난의 날에 네가 입을 크게 벌릴 것이 아니며

sentences.original_text: But thou shouldest not have looked on the day of thy brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 네 형제의 날을 바라보지 않았어야 했으니

sentences.original_text: in the day that he became a stranger
neither shouldest thou have rejoiced over the children of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 유다 자손을 인하여 기뻐하지도 않았어야 하니

sentences.original_text: in the day of their destruction
neither shouldest thou have spoken proudly
